blogPost.excerpt: Robot coffee shop using off-the-shelf equipment to customize their menu faster and offer a large variety of drinks at a lower price than other robot coffee shops.
blogPost.body: Robot coffee shop using off-the-shelf equipment to customize their menu faster and offer a large variety of drinks at a lower price than other robot coffee shops.
blogPost.title: Robo Esso - Automated coffee shop using off-the-shelf hardware
blogPost.author: Freeman LaFleur
